raw_body:
ABEYADEERA BAPTIST – Dearly beloved husband of the late Dorothy,​ loving dad of Debra,​ Suzette and Denham,​ father-in-law of Brian,​ Russel and Fleur,​ grandfather of Melissa,​ Brinne,​ Aidan,​ Shawnayle and Keyan,​ great grandfather of Ariya,​ died peacefully in Melbourne,​ Australia on 14 March 2024. Funeral will take place on Friday,​ 22 March 2024 at 11.30 a.m. in Melbourne.
019614
